entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9605] It is expected that OtherReserves with a value of -213,318,000 reported in the network role http://www.esma.europa.eu/xbrl/role/all/ias_1_role-210000 should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:OtherReservesMember and a reported value of -126,335,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.esma.europa.eu/xbrl/role/all/ias_1_role-610000. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:OtherReserves fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of OtherReserves : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900NY2GSZWWUBW049/2020-12-31/ESEF/DE/0/krones.zip/krones/reports/krones.xhtml 10064
